name: Rising Together
description: Rising Together is designed specifically for youth of color in 9th- 12th grades to safely and collectively experience the healing capacity of the outdoors. The group will engage in a 7-day camping and kayaking expedition at Tomales Bay State Park. Students explore concepts such as trust, social justice, identity, and leadership through activities designed for their age group. Living outdoors together provides the format and structure through which young people can develop the physical, emotional

howToGetIt: Steps for Admission: 1) Submit application at https://www.tfaforms.com/5036858 2) Participate in a phone or zoom interview 3) If accepted, complete a medical form and submit payment for the course Application Instructions: 1) This application should be completed by the participant along with a parent or legal guardian - parent consent and signature are required. 2) Proof of Covid-19 vaccination will be required to participate in all programs. 3) You may apply for up to 3 summer programs with this application. Use the link in the section called Apply for a Program.
cost: variable, sliding scale. A Free waiver can be requested on a case by case basis.
